title: Silicon Sports & Riot Games OPL Final | Melbourne

embed.description: Silicon Sports is proud to present the League of Legends - Oceania OPL final at Hoyts Highpoint on Saturday August 8th. The Oceanic Pro League final will be played live at Sydney's Luna Park! Come and join us to watch the final, live from the Big Top - all from the comfort of Hoyts Highpoint and experience all action as though you were there!

body:
Silicon Sports is proud to present the League of Legends - Oceania OPL final at Hoyts Highpoint on Saturday August 8th.

The Oceanic Pro League final will be played live at Sydney's Luna Park! Come and join us to watch the final, live from the Big Top - all from the comfort of Hoyts Highpoint and experience all action as though you were there!

Be sure to reserve your seat and be one of the fans that will be watching when Oceania’s representative is crowned. The winner of the OPL final will be off to the International Wildcard Tournament to fight for a spot at the World Championships in Berlin, Germany. 

Your ticket includes a swag bag with a skin code and there will be plenty of events to participate in on the night for even more awesome loot!

---------

We also invite you to visit [Silicon Sports ](http://siliconsports.net/)and take a look at our many other events around Melbourne for all things eSports. We are a community run organisation and we need you to help build eSports in Australia!
